snippet: Ohio State quarterback J. T. Barrett was cited Saturday morning by the Columbus police on a charge of operating a vehicle under the influence, a misdemeanor.
abstract: Ohio State quarterback J T Barrett is suspended for one game after being arrested for driving under influence.
lead_paragraph: Ohio State quarterback J. T. Barrett was cited Saturday morning by the Columbus police on a charge of operating a vehicle under the influence, a misdemeanor.

headline.main: Ohio State Quarterback Is Suspended After Arrest
headline.print_headline: Ohio State Quarterback Is Suspended for a Game
